channel.title: Best training
channel.description:
What is your best training spot in Rs?
List your stats and the xp/hr you get, the type of skill it is, and the money earned.

item.title: Best training
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

salve amulet (e) dclaws and ankou are great xp, most good loot is stackable, downside is its boring as hell

I’m using my salve amulet, not (e) on armored zombies because you there’s an altar directly above them which means you can use prayer (turm, ultimate strength, etc etc) without consuming prayer potions. Also, I protect melee and wear prayer bonus gear which allows even longer trips without having to go recharge prayer.

Read full topic

item.title: Best training
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:13, topic:436877”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=539592.msg3950469#msg3950469 date=1332245646]

Troll invasion with d claws n void is prob best melee xp ph. At around 77 str i was getting 80k xp ph there.

That’s insane. Can you lose your items if you die there?

Yeah its amazing, I used void with d claws, I think super sets and piety too. You don’t loose items, remember to do the minigame properly once you get your full reward before doing this.
[/quote]

Rewards? I’m at school atm so I can’t check myself[/quote]
Xp book once per month, roughly 3x of an effigy http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Troll_Invasion
How to do it http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CYxA-l--GVw its best xp imo

Read full topic

item.title: Best training
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Vyres at Darkmeyer for melee or range training, both getting surplus 100k xp/hr. Magic you can burst/barrage at chaos dwarves.

item.title: Best training
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“BloodRayne, post:3, topic:436877”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=539592.msg3949418#msg3949418 date=1332168897]
What is your best training spot in Rs?

List your stats and the xp/hr you get.
[/quote]

There is a wide range of options when it comes to training skills. In the end, the xp/h you’ll get depends on how much money you’re willing to spend/make

Give me some specifics and I’ll give you some more information[/quote]
I’m personally not looking for some information, I’m just making a topic :b

Topic: Armored zombies, any combat stat, about 35-40k/hr depending on your prayer bonus.

Read full topic

item.title: Best training
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

It varies on your stats, what your using etc.
Troll invasion with d claws n void is prob best melee xp ph. At around 77 str i was getting 80k xp ph there.
Range - black knives with ferrorcous ring with slayer tasks in her dung but on tasks like greaters was like 70kk xp ph assuming it took you that long. If not that ranging avi’s is like 60k xp ph, cannon daggs is decent and obv chinning.
Mage, superheat item 90k mage xp ph not sure about how much smith xp ph as depends on what your superheating after that plank make depends how fast u are but up to 140k xp ph generally you’ll get about 110k xp ph.
Just realised you meant for all stats, cba saying them all but thats combat;p.

Read full topic
